data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In the last 10 years, engineers have created onsite health facilities that are now being used by factories and companies around the world to improve the health and well-being of their employees. Many ____ these ____ facilities ____ equipped ____ showers ____ lockers ____ encourage ____ to ____ healthy ____ exercising. Some ____ offer ____ massages ____ even ____ lunch ____ incentives ____ their ____ to ____ care ____ their ____. Some companies even offer insurance discounts as a reward for their employees' improved health.
data.partBlankContent: In the last 10 years, engineers have created onsite health facilities that are now being used by factories and companies around the world to improve the health and well-being of their employees. Many o_ these ons___ facilities a__ equipped wi__ showers a__ lockers t_ encourage empl_____ to st__ healthy b_ exercising. Some facil_____ offer fr__ massages o_ even fr__ lunch a_ incentives f__ their empl_____ to ta__ care o_ their hea___. Some companies even offer insurance discounts as a reward for their employees' improved health.
data.answer: 在过去的10年里，工程师们创建了现场健康设施，现在世界各地的工厂和公司都在使用这些设施来改善员工的健康和福祉。为了鼓励员工通过锻炼来保持健康，很多公司都配备了淋浴和储物柜。一些设施提供免费按摩，甚至免费午餐，以鼓励员工注意健康。一些公司甚至提供保险折扣，作为员工健康改善的奖励。
